title: Lovely Large 4 rooms 1 Bedroom Heated and Hot water
posting_body: Lovely, extremely large 4 rooms, 1 bedroom, built in office / sun room combination.
with sliding glass door to nice back yard.
Eat in kitchen lots of cabinets, stove, micro, dishwasher, refrigerator.
Bright apartment, 1st floor, parking, laundry, minutes to expressway, public transportation and BW South Shore Hospital.
For an appointment to see please call 617-733-2805.
